mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(communityno, title, contents, rdate, files, filesaved, thumb, filesize, map, youtube, mp4, memberno, communitycateno) VALUES(community_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{contents}, sysdate, #{files}, #{filesaved}, #{thumb}, #{filesize}, #{map}, #{youtube}, #{mp4}, #{memberno}, #{communitycateno})
mapper.select: SELECT community.communityno, community.title, community.rdate, member.nickname, communitycate.name, community.memberno, community.communitycateno, community.files, community.communitylikes, reply_count.total FROM community JOIN communitycate ON community.communitycateno = communitycate.communitycateno JOIN member ON community.memberno = member.memberno LEFT JOIN (SELECT communityno, COUNT(*) as total FROM reply GROUP BY communityno) reply_count ON community.communityno = reply_count.communityno ORDER BY community.rdate DESC

SELECT community.communityno, community.title, community.rdate, member.nickname, communitycate.name, community.memberno, community.communitycateno, community.files, community.communitylikes, reply_count.total FROM community JOIN communitycate ON community.communitycateno = communitycate.communitycateno JOIN member ON community.memberno = member.memberno LEFT JOIN (SELECT communityno, COUNT(*) as total FROM reply GROUP BY communityno) reply_count ON community.communityno = reply_count.communityno WHERE (community.communitycateno = communitycate.communitycateno AND community.memberno = member.memberno AND community.title LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR community.contents LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%') ORDER BY community.rdate DESC
